      • hazard

        public static Hazard hazard(HazardModel model,
                            CalcConfig config,
                            Site site,
                            Optional<Executor> ex)
                     throws InterruptedException,
                            ExecutionException
        Compute probabilistic seismic hazard, possibly using an Optional Executor. If no executor is supplied, the calculation will run on the current thread.
        Parameters:
        model - to use
        config - calculation properties
        site - of interest
        ex - optional Executor to use in calculation
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if an Executor was supplied and the calculation is interrupted
        ExecutionException - if an Executor was supplied and a problem arises during the calculation
